name: Floowandereeze & Robina
text: If this face-up card leaves the field, banish it. You can only use each of the following effects of "Floowandereeze & Robina" once per turn, also you cannot Special Summon the turn you activate either of those effects. If this card is Normal Summoned: You can add 1 Level 4 or lower Winged Beast monster from your Deck to your hand, then, immediately after this effect resolves, you can Normal Summon 1 Winged Beast monster. If a Winged Beast monster is Normal Summoned to your field while this card is banished: You can add this card to your hand.
